activities: Customerville partners with our client companies (“Client Companies or “Client Company”) to help them collect and use customer feedback, often via a web survey.   Customerville collects Personal Information from individuals who respond to a survey. That Personal Information is the property of our Client Companies, and neither they nor we provide it to any other party.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: When completing a survey a participant may be asked, as appropriate, to enter his or her name, e-mail address, mailing address, telephone number or survey responses. We may also ask for other information about the participant's experience with our Client Company, or about him or herself.
